splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURES OF THIS VERSION

articles.title: 🔥 Dynamic text insertion in the website editor
articles.desc: A new option has been added on the website editor to let you insert dynamic texts such as user name or unsubscribe links.

articles.title: 🔥 Send website emails with AcyMailing
articles.desc: A new option lets you send all the website emails with AcyMailing.

articles.title: 🔥 Preferences page
articles.desc: The unsubscribe page has been entirely redone with a new design and new customisable settings.

articles.title: 🎁 BCC on automations
articles.desc: You can now set BCC on automation emails

articles.title: 🎁 Import subscribers report
articles.desc: The report when importing subscribers have been improved to show clearer information.

articles.title: 🎁 Update performances
articles.desc: We improved performances during updates and during the verification of AcyMailing tables from the configuration.

articles.title: 🎁 Automated tasks security
articles.desc: Our cron service for automated tasks now handles the cron security key option.

articles.title: 🧩 Better RSEventsPro integration
articles.desc: A new option in the RSEventsPro add-on lets you choose the menu to use when links are built.

articles.title: 🧩 Event Booking waiting list
articles.desc: The Event Booking waiting list is now handled when filtering registrants in the automations.

articles.title: 🧩 Customizable user profile
articles.desc: You can now insert HTML in the intro and post text in the AcyMailing user profile menu

articles.title: 🧩 JCE editor custom CSS
articles.desc: The custom CSS is now correctly handled for the newest versions of the JCE editor when in edition mode.

articles.title: 🧩 Community Builder fix
articles.desc: We fixed a possible error message on the Community Builder integration plugin.

articles.title: 🧩 Menu user import
articles.desc: Fixed the subscriber import from the management menu that didn't show the fields assignment.

articles.title: 🧩 Joomla 5 fix
articles.desc: We fixed an error on Joomla 5 websites when the compatibility plugin was disabled.

articles.title: 🧩 Auto login recipients
articles.desc: A new option lets you auto login recipients when they click on a link in your email.

articles.title: 🧩 Subscription form for all themes
articles.desc: The widget subscription form creation now handles themes that have a dedicated edition page.

articles.title: 🧩 Better Gravity Forms integration
articles.desc: An AcyMailing user isn't automatically created anymore on every Gravity Forms form, but only when AcyMailing lists are added to it.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: 🛠 Templates thumbnails generation
articles.desc: A new thumbnail was generated each time a template was saved, this has been fixed.

articles.title: 🛠 Editor toolbar responsiveness
articles.desc: Fixed responsiveness of the text editor toolbar not displaying all buttons on some window sizes.

articles.title: 🛠 XSS patch
articles.desc: Fixed an XSS vulnerability on the queue listing that could impact a connected administrator clicking on a external malicious link.

articles.title: 🛠 Templates creation
articles.desc: Fixed an issue on the template creation that could create 2 templates.

articles.title: 🛠 Automatic Bounce handling connection
articles.desc: Fixed bounce handling not processing messages since the Oauth2 connection in some cases.

articles.title: 🛠 Multilingual templates filtering
articles.desc: The filter by tag when selecting a template has been fixed on the multilingual feature.

articles.title: 🛠 Search on lists selection
articles.desc: The search is now correctly applied after selecting/unselecting all lists in the recipients step of a campaign.

articles.title: 🛠 Date format
articles.desc: Changed the date format in the detailed statistics page for the American English language.

articles.title: 🛠 User import duplication
articles.desc: Fixed an issue on the subscriber import feature that could create duplicated subscribers.

articles.title: 🛠 Textarea custom fields
articles.desc: The line returns are now kept in textarea custom field values.

articles.title: 🛠 REST API warnings
articles.desc: Fixed some error messages that could happen when creating a campaign using the REST API.
